item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 15, 2025 at 2:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Jane Street's Figgie card game (131 points | 15 comments)
2. Twelve months at 1.5 °C signals earlier than expected breach of Paris Agreement (52 points | 16 comments)
3. The 20 year old PSP can now connect to WPA2 WiFi Networks (277 points | 90 comments)
4. Apache Iceberg now supports geospatial data types natively (51 points | 3 comments)
5. Show HN: Kreuzberg – Modern async Python library for document text extraction (50 points | 19 comments)
6. A decade later, a decade lost (2024) (413 points | 115 comments)
7. Gazeta Wyborcza, Poland's largest newspaper quits X, now on Bluesky (57 points | 16 comments)
8. The hardest working font in Manhattan (474 points | 70 comments)
9. Rust Memory Management Explained (22 points | 8 comments)
10. What situations in classical physics are non-deterministic? (4 points | 2 comments)
11. The Impact of Generative AI on Critical Thinking [pdf] (80 points | 59 comments)
12. Nping – ping, but with a graph or table view (67 points | 28 comments)
13. Q2DOS – Quake 2 backported to MS-DOS (99 points | 60 comments)
14. Did Semgrep Just Get a Lot More Interesting? (110 points | 41 comments)
15. Show HN: Letting LLMs Run a Debugger (44 points | 15 comments)
16. If you ever stacked cups in gym class, blame my dad (237 points | 38 comments)
17. We were wrong about GPUs (583 points | 376 comments)
18. The largest sofa you can move around a corner (162 points | 75 comments)
19. The Iconic 3DBenchy Enters the Public Domain (157 points | 13 comments)
20. Can We Trust AI Benchmarks? A Review of Current Issues in AI Evaluation (12 points | 1 comment)
21. Bookshop.org launches Kindle alternative, sends e-book sales to local bookstores (108 points | 38 comments)
22. Recurring checklists using Org Mode in Emacs (36 points | 2 comments)
23. Tennis great Steffi Graf got bitten by pickleball's 'fun factor' (3 points | 5 comments)
24. TeX and Typst: Layout Models (2024) (208 points | 30 comments)
25. Questioning the Criteria for Evaluating Non-Cryptographic Hash Functions (34 points | 7 comments)
26. Show HN: Transform your codebase into a single Markdown doc for feeding into AI (250 points | 156 comments)
27. Msxbook OneChipMSX MSX2 Computer (54 points | 18 comments)
28. Elements of Programming (2009) (132 points | 9 comments)
29. Complex dynamics require complex solutions (173 points | 118 comments)
30. Goku Flow Based Video Generative Foundation Models (15 points | 2 comments)
